name: APE DON'T STUDY
description:
You are an ape that doesn't want to write his essay. However, the essay somehow became alive with evil, productive energy and is now chasing you. See how long you can last escaping from your responsibilities!

Press WASD to move

Press Space to check your phone

Press E to close the popups from your computer

Artists:

Sarah Y.

Yufei X.

Mudi L.

Rosemary W.

Bob W.

Programmers:

Andre P.

Bob W.

Masato L.

Danial A.

AUDIO from freesound.org and soundsnap.com

Assets of bookshelves and windows from  SorceressGameLab on itch.io
